eas_text: A civil authority has issued A HAZARDOUS MATERIALS WARNING for the following counties or areas: Rensselaer, NY; at 08:34 AM ON JAN 7, 2026 Effective until 08:34 AM JAN 8, 2026. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A PROPANE LEAK AT THE TACONIC FACILITY ON COON BROOK RD HAS FORCED A 1/2 MILE EVACUATION.
